attributes.action: Help Aid Agencies into Bangladesh for Rohingya Muslim refugees.
attributes.additional_details: We are requesting the UK Government to help the Rohingya Muslims. Although both the Burmese and Bangladeshi governments say the violence has abated, fleeing refugees claim mass arrests and arson attacks aimed at driving out the Rohingyas continue. The Bangladeshi authorities have refused to accept the refugees and have pushed back boatloads of Rohingyas. Please help Aid agencies into Bangladesh, supply needed food and medicine.
